title: I've donated my hair

You can donate hair?
For what reason?
Or did you just get a haircut?
xD

replies.body: I am proud of you! I donated my hair too :) For mine, its a program called hair for hope. Where we shave ourselves bald to feel how people with cancer (who are bald too). We donated our hair to make wigs :)
replies.body_tagged: I am proud of you! I donated my hair too :) For mine, its a program called hair for hope. Where we shave ourselves bald to feel how people with cancer (who are bald too). We donated our hair to make wigs :)

replies.body: Being bald with Cancer is nothing to be ashamed of....
replies.body_tagged: Being bald with Cancer is nothing to be ashamed of....

replies.body: No one said it was. But sunburn isn't fun in sunny weather, and cold weather is just.. Cold. As well as that, many people enjoy having hair as opposed to having none.
